Posts.Content: Hi all, glad your feeling on the canton04   Just been reading all the posts they are great. I have a question about FEC-T. i've had three cycles of FEC, about to start T. What happens with our nails? why are u putting black nail varnish on? Do I need to do that? Any advise would be appreciated..   thank you
Posts.Title: Taxotere - started today - Side effects?

Posts.Content: Hi George and Jackie,   ee!! I didn't know about the nail situation.  Well I suppose its like my hair I'm not to fussed about loosing it as I know it will grow back.. thank u very much for your speedy reply xxx big hugs   Julie
